text: Lisa McClain ( Iovannisci; born April 7, 1966) is an American politician. She is a Republican. McClain is a member of the United States House of Representatives for since 2021. In 2025, she became the Chair of the House Republican Conference. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Lisa McClain
